msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; some writing on the Verso
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at the left and at the right. Kollesis to the left of center and the left leaf is slightly darker than that to the right. Two small pieces of papyrus appear to be glued on to the back of this papyrus, probably for fortification of the sheet. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Diairesis used occasionally. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Phaesis, son of Heras, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Isidora (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 244)
Achillas, son of Heron, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Didyme (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 158)
Apynchis, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 154)
Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Thaisas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 219)
Petheus, son of Kephalas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 202)
Taelekis, daughter of Petheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 232)
Neilos, son of Louppos, grandson of Horos, mother Ammonarios (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 190)
Ptollas, son of Horos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 221)
Ptollas, son of Abel (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 221)
Tasoucharion, fatherless, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 239)
Ptolemaios, son of Chairemon, grandson of Horos, mother Stotoetis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 216)
Achillas, son of Phasis, grandson of Zenas, mother Tasingonis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 158)
Herois, daughter of Ptollas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 170)
Syros, son of Onnophris, grandson of Maron, mother Tkollainis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 231)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

keywords.term: see electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224;

div.ab: "(Column) 48:;Phaesis, son of Heras, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Isidora, obols 28;;Achillas, son of Heron, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Didyme, drachmas 4;;Apynchis, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Thaisas, drachmas 8;;Petheus, son of Kephalas (Pekmoul);;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachma 1 obols 2, tax on the produce of olives obol 1 chalki 2, naubion obol 1, surcharges obols 2 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 8 obols 23) eparourion obols 5.5, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos 0.5, in total drachmas 3 obol 1;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 6 obols 4, surcharges obols 2.5, in total drachmas 7 obol 0.5;;Taelekis, daughter of Petheus (Priamos);;(in left margin: drachmas 20 obols 22) orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 10, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obol 2.5, naubion drachma 1, surcharges drachmas 2 obols 3;;eparourion drachmas 6 obols 4, surcharges drachmas obols 3.5, kollybos obols 2 chalki 2, in total drachmas 22 obols 3 chalki 2;;Neilos, son of Louppos, grandson of Horos, mother Ammonarios, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 200 obols 22;;(Pharmouthi) 8:;Ptollas, son of Horos (Ptollas, son of Abel);;(in left margin: drachmas 40 obols 20) orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 5, tax on the produce of olives obols 4 chalki 2, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obl 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 11 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;and to Tasoucharion, fatherless, mother Tasoucharion;;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 6 obol 1.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 5.5, naubion obols 3.5 chalki 2, surcharges drachma 1 obols 3.5;;eparourion drachmas 4 obol 1, surcharges obols 2, kollybos obol 1.5, in total drachmas 1obol 0.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 15, surcharges obols 5.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 15 obols 5.5 chalki 2;;Ptolemaios, son of Chairemon, grandson of Horos, mother Stotoetis, drachmas 32;;Achillas, son of Phasis, grandson of Zenas, mother Tasingonis, drachmas 12, chalki copper drachmas 4;;Herois, daughter of Ptollas (Drillokrokai);;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 3 obols 2, tax on the produce of olives obols3, naubion obols 2, surcharges obols 5;;(in left margin: drachmas 16 obols 28) eparourion drachmas 4 obols 2.5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 2 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 10;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 8 obols 2, surcharges obols 3 chalki 2, in total drachmas 8 obols 5 chalki 2;;Valerius Longus (Drillokrokai);;(in left margin: drachmas 8 obols 8) orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachma 1 obols 4, tax on the produce of olives obol 1.5, naubion obol 1, surcharges obols 2.5;;eparourion drachma 1 obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1, kollybos 0.5, in total drachmas 3 obols 5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 4 obol 1, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 4 obols 2.5 chalki 2;;Syros, son of Onnophris, grandson of Maron, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 16."
